DataElement.preferredName: Concept Reference Object Negation Flag java.lang.Boolean
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A unit of knowledge created by a unique combination of characteristics. (ISO 1087):Something referred to; the object of a reference._Negation is an operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true. The indicator usually takes the form of a single binary digit, or bit (either 0 or 1). (from Dictionary of Computers)_Value Domain for java language Boolean datatype

(ISO 1087):Something referred to; the object of a reference._Negation is an operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true. The indicator usually takes the form of a single binary digit, or bit (either 0 or 1). (from Dictionary of Computers)

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A unit of knowledge created by a unique combination of characteristics. (ISO 1087):Something referred to; the object of a reference.

Concepts.definition: A unit of knowledge created by a unique combination of characteristics.
Something referred to; the object of a reference.

Property.preferredDefinition: Negation is an operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true. The indicator usually takes the form of a single binary digit, or bit (either 0 or 1). (from Dictionary of Computers)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
